verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has a <S%H7379>charge<s%> against the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land:<s%> "Indeed there is no <S%H571>truth,<s%> nor <S%H2617>goodness,<s%> nor <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

There is <S%H422>cursing,<s%> <S%H3584>lying,<s%> <S%H7523>murder,<s%> <S%H1589>stealing,<s%> and committing <S%H5003>adultery;<s%> they break <S%H6555>boundaries,<s%> and <S%H1818>bloodshed<s%> <S%H5060>causes<s%> <S%H1818>bloodshed.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H776>land<s%> will <S%H56>mourn,<s%> and everyone who <S%H3427>dwells<s%> therein will <S%H535>waste<s%> <S%H2416>away.<s%> all living things in her, even the animals of the <S%H7704>field<s%> and the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky;<s%> <S%H1709>yes,<s%> the fish of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> also <S%H622>die.<s%>

"Yet let no <S%H376>man<s%> bring a <S%H7378>charge,<s%> neither let any man <S%H3198>accuse;<s%> <S%H376><s%> For your <S%H5971>people<s%> are like those who bring <S%H7378>charges<s%> against a <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

You will <S%H3782>stumble<s%> in the <S%H3117>day,<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> will also <S%H3782>stumble<s%> with you in the <S%H3915>night;<s%> and I will <S%H1820>destroy<s%> your <S%H517>mother.<s%>

My <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H1820>destroyed<s%> for lack of <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%> Because you have <S%H3988>rejected<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> I will also <S%H3988>reject<s%> <S%H3547>you,<s%> that you may be no priest to <S%H7911>me.<s%> Because you have forgotten your <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H8451>law,<s%> I will also <S%H7911>forget<s%> your <S%H1121>children.<s%>
As they were <S%H7230>multiplied,<s%> so they <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H4171>me.<s%> I will change their <S%H3519>glory<s%> into <S%H7036>shame.<s%>
They <S%H398>feed<s%> on the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H5375>set<s%> their <S%H5315>heart<s%> on their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
It will <S%H5971>be,<s%> like people, like <S%H3548>priest;<s%> and I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> them for their <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and will <S%H7725>repay<s%> them for their <S%H4611>deeds.<s%>

They will <S%H398>eat,<s%> and not have <S%H7646>enough.<s%> They will play the <S%H2181>prostitute,<s%> and will not <S%H6555>increase;<s%> because they have <S%H5800>abandoned<s%> <S%H8104>giving<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7592>consult<s%> with their wooden <S%H6086>idol,<s%> and <S%H5046>answer<s%> to a <S%H4731>stick<s%> of <S%H7307>wood.<s%> Indeed the spirit of <S%H2183>prostitution<s%> has led them <S%H8582>astray,<s%> and they have been <S%H2181>unfaithful<s%> to their <S%H430>God.<s%>

They <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> on the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> on the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> under <S%H437>oaks<s%> and <S%H3839>poplars<s%> and <S%H424>terebinths,<s%> because its <S%H6738>shade<s%> is <S%H2896>good.<s%> Therefore your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> play the <S%H2181>prostitute,<s%> and your <S%H3618>brides<s%> commit <S%H5003>adultery.<s%>

I will not <S%H6485>punish<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> when they play the <S%H2181>prostitute,<s%> nor your <S%H3618>brides<s%> when they commit <S%H5003>adultery;<s%> because the men <S%H6504>consort<s%> with <S%H2181>prostitutes,<s%> and they <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> with the shrine <S%H6948>prostitutes;<s%> so the <S%H5971>people<s%> without <S%H995>understanding<s%> will come to <S%H3832>ruin.<s%>

"Though <S%H3478>you,<s%> Israel, play the <S%H2181>prostitute,<s%> yet <S%H3063>don't<s%> let Judah <S%H816>offend;<s%> and <S%H935>don't<s%> come to <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> neither go <S%H5927>up<s%> to Beth <S%H1007>Aven,<s%> nor <S%H7650>swear,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'As Yahweh <S%H2416>lives.<s%>'

For <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has behaved extremely <S%H5637>stubbornly,<s%> like a <S%H5637>stubborn<s%> <S%H6510>heifer.<s%> Then how will <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> them like a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> in a <S%H4800>meadow.<s%>

Their <S%H5435>drink<s%> has become <S%H5493>sour.<s%> They play the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> <S%H2181>continually.<s%> Her <S%H4043>rulers<s%> <S%H3051>dearly<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> their shameful <S%H7036>way.<s%>
The <S%H7307>wind<s%> has wrapped her <S%H6887>up<s%> in its <S%H3671>wings;<s%> and they shall be <S%H954>disappointed<s%> because of their <S%H2077>sacrifices.<s%>
